actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the assassination of Kemal Arikan, a consul general of the Government of Turkey assigned to the United States.

summary.text: Condemns the assassination of Kemal Arikan, a consul general of Turkey assigned to the United States. Expresses the sympathy of the House of Representatives for his family, his government, and his people. Urges law enforcement authorities to investigate and prosecute the offenders to the maximum extent practicable and to take appropriate steps to deter future attacks.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the assassination of Kemal Arikan, a consul general of the Government of Turkey assigned to the United States.
